content: प्रबाध् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To press hard upon, oppress. {@--2@} To trouble, torment, harass, tease, hurt; समुच्छ्रितानेव तरून् प्रबाधते (प्रभंजनः) <ls>H. 1</ls>; <ls>Bk. 12. 2.</ls> {@--3@} To drive away, remove, get over; कथं च दैवं शक्येत पौरुषेण प्रबाधितुं <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--4@} To throw down, destroy. {@--5@} To repel, repulse.
